item.description:
OK folks...here's the info for New Years Eve at the Bar 2421 @ Hawthorne Inn!!!

 Seating is limited for those wanting the full dinner package at Bar 2421, make your reservations soon ($60)!!! 

For those of you not wanting dinner, but wanna be part of the hottest 'ol skool dance party at the Connecticut's swankiest and hippest new adult nightclub, a $20 cover charge will get you in...singles and couples are both more than welcome...dress to impress...lotsa buzz about both this new great venue and this special New Years Eve event!!!  Big dance floor and trendy decor...don't miss the hottest New Years Eve shindig in Connecticut!!!
Call the Hawthorne Inn at 860-828-3571 for info and reservations!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: New Year's Eve Bash at the Hawthorne Inn
